rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0001
rows.name:
When the White Whale broke apart, many of the pods
were ejected just like this one[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0002
rows.name: You could say you were one of the lucky ones.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0003
rows.name: Oh, right... you don't remember the White Whale, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0004
rows.name:
The White Whale is the nickname for the Earth escape ship L-002.
Do you remember Earth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0005
rows.name: Your[ST:wide ]― wait, no, our home planet.[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0005_2
rows.name: Or maybe I should say, it used to be our home planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Earth got caught in the middle of a massive battle
between two alien groups[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Don't push it.
You'll remember things gradually, it's fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Looks like this isn't the time
to be taking it easy, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0011
rows.name:
This place is no paradise.
We have to fight the enemies that come after us.[ST:wait ]
